value_claims.claim_title: Clearwater-GPT to deliver productivity gains and cost reductions
value_claims.claim_description: Clearwater-GPT promises to enable significant productivity gains, cost reductions, and competitive advantage for clients through generative AI applications that accelerate decision-making and help take advantage of market opportunities.
value_claims.source_quote: Clearwater-GPT promises to be an extraordinary breakthrough for our clients that will enable significant productivity gains, cost reductions, and an enviable competitive advantage.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: CEO explicitly attributes productivity gains and cost reductions to Clearwater-GPT generative AI technology

value_claims.claim_title: Clearwater-GPT drives operational improvements and faster customer request handling
value_claims.claim_description: Clearwater-GPT is being used by employees to drive operational improvements and handle customer requests faster across business functions, modernizing client experience and reducing company costs.
value_claims.source_quote: Clearwater-GPT is already being used by our employees to drive operational improvements and handle customer requests faster across business functions modernizing the client experience and reducing our own costs.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: CTO directly states Clearwater-GPT is being used to drive operational improvements and handle requests faster

value_claims.claim_description: Implementation and service teams plan to use Clearwater-GPT to expedite client onboarding, ensuring seamless experience and faster track to production.
value_claims.source_quote: The implementation and service teams at Clearwater plan to use Clearwater-GPT to expedite client onboarding, ensuring a seamless experience for clients and a faster track to production.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Explicitly states teams plan to use Clearwater-GPT to expedite onboarding

value_claims.claim_title: Clearwater-GPT to increase auto-reconciliation percentage meaningfully
value_claims.claim_description: Clearwater-GPT aims to meaningfully increase the percentage of auto-reconciliation and deliver intraday reconciliation processing, improving capacity to serve clients.
value_claims.source_quote: Additionally, the tool will aim to increase the percentage of auto-reconciliation meaningfully and deliver on intraday reconciliation processing.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Tool explicitly aims to increase auto-reconciliation percentage

value_claims.claim_title: $75k annual AWS hosting cost savings from Atlassian Cloud migration
value_claims.claim_description: Clearwater Analytics saved $75,000 per year on AWS hosting costs by migrating to Atlassian Cloud Premium from Data Center.
value_claims.source_quote: saving $75k per year on hosting costs by migrating to Atlassian Cloud Premium
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Savings from cloud migration, not AI-specific, but part of broader technology modernization enabling AI capabilities

value_claims.claim_title: Atlassian Cloud automation saves huge time through ticket creation/elimination
value_claims.claim_description: Moving to Jira Service Management cloud and building automation to create or eliminate tickets has led to huge time savings for Clearwater.
value_claims.source_quote: Moving into Jira Service Management cloud and building out a lot of automation to create or even eliminate tickets has been a huge time savings too.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Automation features enable efficiency but not explicitly AI-driven; supports AI infrastructure

value_claims.claim_title: 3 days per week engineering effort saved through AWS preventive controls
value_claims.claim_description: Clearwater saved 3 days of engineering effort per week by using preventive controls on AWS from the start, avoiding time loss from tracing and fixing noncompliant resources.
value_claims.source_quote: Using the preventive controls on AWS from the start to save 3 days of engineering effort per week, avoiding time loss resulting from tracing and fixing noncompliant resources.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AWS governance controls save time but not AI-specific; infrastructure enables AI development

value_claims.claim_title: 200% increase in resource management capacity on AWS
value_claims.claim_description: Using AWS Organizations, Control Tower, and CloudFormation, Clearwater can manage up to 200% more resources than it could on premises.
value_claims.source_quote: Using AWS Organizations, AWS Control Tower, and AWS CloudFormation, Clearwater can manage up to 200 percent more resources than it could on premises.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cloud infrastructure capacity increase enables AI development but not directly AI-driven

value_claims.claim_title: AWS sandbox access reduced from 2 weeks to 5 minutes
value_claims.claim_description: Developers can access AWS resources in 5 minutes in sandbox environment, and it takes 2 hours instead of 2 weeks to spin up an AWS account for projects.
value_claims.source_quote: Now, developers can access AWS resources in 5 minutes in a sandbox environment, and it takes 2 hours instead of 2 weeks to spin up an AWS account set for projects.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Infrastructure automation enables faster development including AI projects but not AI-specific

value_claims.claim_description: Annualized Recurring Revenue reached $427.2M as of June 30, 2024, an increase of 22.2% from $349.5M as of June 30, 2023.
value_claims.quote_location: CEO statement and Key Metrics Summary
value_claims.attribution_evidence: CEO mentions generative AI investments driving revenue growth; ARR growth partially attributable to AI capabilities

value_claims.claim_title: 35% Adjusted EBITDA growth year-over-year in Q2 2024
value_claims.claim_description: Adjusted EBITDA for Q2 2024 was $33.4M, an increase of 34.7% from $24.8M in Q2 2023, with margin increasing 370 basis points to 31.3%.
value_claims.quote_location: CEO statement and Financial Results Summary
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Growth driven by platform efficiency and innovation including AI investments mentioned by CEO

value_claims.claim_title: 117% free cash flow growth year-over-year in Q2 2024
value_claims.claim_description: Free cash flows for Q2 2024 were $42.4M, an increase of 116.9% from $19.6M in Q2 2023.
value_claims.source_quote: our free cash flows grew by 117% compared to the previous year
value_claims.quote_location: CEO statement and Financial Results Summary
value_claims.attribution_evidence: CEO links operational efficiency improvements including AI investments to financial performance

value_claims.claim_title: Generative AI investments to drive responsiveness, data quality, and revenue growth
value_claims.claim_description: Clearwater continues to make meaningful investments in generative AI to drive responsiveness and completeness to customer requests, improve data quality, and drive revenue growth.
value_claims.source_quote: we continue to make meaningful investments in generative AI to drive responsiveness and completeness to customer requests, improve data quality and drive revenue growth.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: CEO explicitly states generative AI investments drive responsiveness, data quality, and revenue growth

context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater Analytics operates in the financial services sector, specifically providing investment management, accounting, reporting, and analytics solutions.
context_claims.source_quote: Clearwater Analytics (NYSE: CWAN), a leading provider of SaaS-based investment management, accounting, reporting, and analytics solutions

context_claims.claim_title: Over $6.4 trillion in assets under management
context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater's platform processes data for over $6.4 trillion in assets, serving over 1,000 companies globally.
context_claims.source_quote: more than $6.4 trillion in assets spanning traditional and alternative asset types

context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater Analytics is a publicly traded company on the New York Stock Exchange under ticker CWAN, having gone public in 2021.
Clearwater-GPT was announced on July 25, 2023, with expected availability to select customers in second half of 2023.
context_claims.source_quote: BOISE, Idaho — July 25, 2023 — Clearwater Analytics (NYSE: CWAN)...announced the upcoming launch of Clearwater-GPT

context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater provides a single instance, multi-tenant SaaS platform for investment management, accounting, reporting, analytics, compliance, and risk management.
context_claims.source_quote: a global, industry-leading SaaS solution, automates the entire investment lifecycle. With a single instance, multi-tenant architecture

context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater Analytics has over 1,700 employees, with over 500 in R&D department.
Clearwater migrated to AWS in 2023 after a 10-month process to support rapid growth and global expansion.
context_claims.source_quote: By migrating to AWS in 2023, Clearwater achieved the ability to scale up and down as needed

context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater is planning to scale across geographic regions with focus on portfolio expansion in Europe.
context_claims.source_quote: Now that Clearwater has gone public, it is looking to scale across geographic regions by focusing on portfolio expansion in Europe.

context_claims.claim_description: Core business function is investment accounting, reconciliation, and regulatory reporting for institutional investors.
context_claims.source_quote: investment management, accounting, reporting, and analytics solutions

context_claims.claim_description: Second quarter 2024 financial results were announced on July 31, 2024, showing strong growth metrics.
context_claims.source_quote: BOISE, Idaho, July 31, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Clearwater Analytics Holdings, Inc....today announced its financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2024.

context_claims.claim_title: Multi-product company strategy with cross-sell focus
context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater is pursuing a multi-product strategy including PRISM, JUMP OMS/PMS, and Stable Value solutions with focus on cross-sell and upsell.
context_claims.source_quote: Clearwater Analytics continued on its journey towards being a multi-product company and successfully drove cross-sell and upsell in the second quarter.

context_claims.claim_description: Clearwater has significant IT and software engineering operations supporting platform development and client services.
